thread.title: This Is What Uni Is Like In Your First Year Vs Your Last
thread.title_full: This Is What Uni Is Like In Your First Year Vs Your Last

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: This Is What Uni Is Like In Your First Year Vs Your Last
text:
View this image › 
Paramount It’s like every day is a mufti day.
ID: 10668328 But in your last year, you’ve given up on trying to impress people, and sometimes barely bother even getting dressed. View this image › 
Paramount ID: 10668330 2. In first year, your timetable is a bit all over the place because you don’t know any better. View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10668337 By the time you’ve reached your last year, you’ve perfected the art of scheduling, maybe even getting your classes down to one or two days a week. View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10668338 3. You never miss a single lecture or tute in first year. View this image › 
Fox ID: 10668340 By the last year, you know which classes you absolutely need to go to, and regularly skip others. View this image › 
Fox ID: 10668341 4. You pay super close attention and take detailed notes in class in your first year. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10668344 But in your last year you tend to tune out more often than not. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10668345 5. In first year, you spend a small fortune on textbooks at the unishop. View this image › 
TriStar ID: 10668346 In your last year, you know to wait and see which you actually need to buy, which you can borrow, and just how many you can skip altogether. View this image › 
TriStar ID: 10668347 6. You do all your readings in first year ahead of class. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10668349 In your last year, you do only the readings you know are necessary - if that. View this image › 
Disney ID: 10668351 7. When you first start uni, you have big plans about being organised and getting assignments done ahead of time. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10668352 By the last year, you leave pretty much everything to the last minute. View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10668353 8. In your first year, you dedicate a lot of time to studying ahead of exams. View this image › 
MTV ID: 10668354 In your last year, you figure you’ve probably absorbed enough information by now and you don’t need to study much. View this image › 
MTV / Via Nickelodeon ID: 10668355 9. When you first start uni, you’re determined to get the best possible marks. View this image › 
Marvel ID: 10668356 By the last year, your motto is “Ps make degrees”. View this image › 
giphy.com ID: 10668357 10. In your first year, you’re super eager to socialise and make friends with the people in your classes. View this image › 
Little Stranger ID: 10668358 In your last year, you spend most of your time avoiding everyone but your close friends. View this image › 
reactiongifs.com ID: 10668359 11. In the first year of uni, the prospect of starting your career is daunting and distant. View this image › 
Fox ID: 10668360 In your last year, you can’t wait to be done studying. View this image › 
Fox Although it can still be hella daunting.
ID: 10668361 12. In your first year of uni, you spend half your nights drinking at the unibar/house parties/pubs and clubs. View this image › 
CW ID: 10668362 And in your last year of uni, you spend all your nights drinking at the unibar/house parties/pubs and clubs. View this image › 
CW ID: 10668363 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
